The rules of Reversi: Reversi is a two player strategy game involving game tiles differentiated by color. The game starts off with 4 of these tiles situated in the middle of the board with white in the upper-left and lower right center and black in the lower-left and upper-right center.
The first move is always made by the player playing as black and once played white can then play.\n The moves a user can make are as follows: 1. Any tile can be placed adjacent (but not necessarily diagonal) to an enemy tile 2. If one or more enemy tiles are diagonal to at least one of your tiles already and there is a freespace on the opposite end of the diagonal then your tile can be played there. 3. It is possible for you or the enemy to play in such a way that the other may not be able to play that turn. \n
